name: NIBI
description: Nibiru Chain is a young blockchain sporting permissionless Wasm smart contracts and infrastructure enhancements tailored for a scalable and secure Web3 ecosystem. Emerging from stealth in late 2022, the Nibiru Network already includes several native dApps, including Nibi-Perps, Nibi-Swap, NUSD, and the Oracle Module. The platformâ€™s community has grown to over 200,000 combined members with more than 20 projects building on chain.
